name: The Tell-tale Heartbeatz
description:
SOURCE | MUSIC | ART

This is our submission for The Public Domain Jam 2. The theme for the jam is "Time/less" and a public domain story must be used in some way. More details on the jam here: http://itch.io/jam/the-public-domain-jam-2

All graphics, audio, music and high level code were created by our team in the 10 days of the jam.

INSTRUCTIONS:

(There is an in-game tutorial screen)

- Use the H,J,K,L keys to play notes

- If you miss a note, the clock will tick forward, if the clock ticks past an hour, you have failed the song

CREDITS:

Stephen Corlett - Programming

Josh Mehlenbacher - Programming

Cam Mehlenbacher - Voice Acting

Brendan Walsh - Music and Sound

Daniel Mullins - Art, Programming

CC0 INFORMATION:

- all audio (music and sound effects), graphics and high level code were created by our team

- Unity3D is allowed by the rules of the game jam
